content: allie ear warmer the allie ear warmer is a quick & classic design that uses mini cables to make a wonderful crochet texture it is easily adjustable in both width and length to give you the perfect fit inside you will find instructions written in us crochet terms but you must already know the basics of crochet materials needed - worsted weight yarn - sample yarn less than one skein mary maxim woodlands yarn - h/8 crochet hook skill level advanced beginner photo tutorial included to help with cables when you purchase this item you will receive an immediate download for your pattern it is a pdf file terms of use this pattern is my original design it is for private use only please do not redistribute or resell it in any way if you have any questions please contact me and i will do my best to help to see more of my creations please visit me on facebook or instagram www facebook com/desertblossomcraft www instagram com/desertblossomcrafts thanks for visiting i hope you were inspired rachel
